title: [宣戰發言] 美國總統川普在聯合國75屆大會，直指中國為全球威脅，而美國的武器比以往任何時候都先進，可以隨時出擊

replies.msg:
https://youtu.be/p0CtV_nMPAI?t=214

SOUNDBITE (English) Donald J. Trump, President, United States of America:
“We will distribute a vaccine, we will defeat the virus, we will end the pandemic, and we will enter a new era of unprecedented prosperity, cooperation and peace. As we pursue this bright future, we must hold accountable the nation which unleashed this plague onto the world: China.”

The US President said China’s carbon emissions “are nearly twice what the US has, and it’s rising fast.” He added, “By contrast, after I withdrew from the one-sided Paris Climate Accord, last year America reduced its carbon emissions by more than any country in the agreement. Those who attack America's exceptional environmental record while ignoring China's rampant pollution are not interested in the environment. They only want to punish America and I will not stand for it.”

Turning to the recently signed peace deals between Israel and the United Arab Emirates and Bahrain, Trump said many other Middle Eastern countries would also sign soon. He added, “These groundbreaking peace deals are the dawn of the new Middle East. By taking a different approach, we have achieved different outcomes. Far superior outcomes. We took an approach and the approach worked. We intend to deliver more peace agreements shortly, and I have never been more optimistic for the future of the region. There is no blood in the sand. Those days are hopefully over.”

Trump said the United States was fulfilling its destiny as peacemaker through its strength. He said his country’s weapons are more advanced than ever and prayed that it would never have to use them.

美國空軍部助理部長（研發，採購及後勤）羅珀透露，美空軍已經試飛第6代戰機原型機。

根據《國防新聞》報導，距離研製第5代戰機的「聯合打擊戰鬥機計畫」（JSF）啟動已有20多年，JSF最後由洛克希德·馬丁的X-35擊敗波音的X-32原型機，並發展成F-35系列。如今，美國空軍正著手於「下一代制空計畫」（Next Generation Air Dominance，NGAD），目標是開發出第6代戰機，以維持絕對的空中優勢。

quote.msg:
https://youtu.be/p0CtV_nMPAI?t=214

SOUNDBITE (English) Donald J. Trump, President, United States of America:
“We will distribute a vaccine, we will defeat the virus, we will end the pandemic, and we will enter a new era of unprecedented prosperity, cooperation and peace. As we pursue this bright future, we must hold accountable the nation which unleashed this plague onto the world: China.”

The US President said China’s carbon emissions “are nearly twice what the US has, and it’s rising fast.” He added, “By contrast, after I withdrew from the one-sided Paris Climate Accord, last year America reduced its carbon emissions by more than any country in the agreement. Those who attack America's exceptional environmental record while ignoring China's rampant pollution are not interested in the environment. They only want to punish America and I will not stand for it.”

Turning to the recently signed peace deals between Israel and the United Arab Emirates and Bahrain, Trump said many other Middle Eastern countries would also sign soon. He added, “These groundbreaking peace deals are the dawn of the new Middle East. By taking a different approach, we have achieved different outcomes. Far superior outcomes. We took an approach and the approach worked. We intend to deliver more peace agreements shortly, and I have never been more optimistic for the future of the region. There is no blood in the sand. Those days are hopefully over.”

Trump said the United States was fulfilling its destiny as peacemaker through its strength. He said his country’s weapons are more advanced than ever and prayed that it would never have to use them.

SOUNDBITE (English) Donald J. Trump, President, United States of America:
“We will distribute a vaccine, we will defeat the virus, we will end the pandemic, and we will enter a new era of unprecedented prosperity, cooperation and peace. As we pursue this bright future, we must hold accountable the nation which unleashed this plague onto the world: China.”

The US President said China’s carbon emissions “are nearly twice what the US has, and it’s rising fast.” He added, “By contrast, after I withdrew from the one-sided Paris Climate Accord, last year America reduced its carbon emissions by more than any country in the agreement. Those who attack America's exceptional environmental record while ignoring China's rampant pollution are not interested in the environment. They only want to punish America and I will not stand for it.”

Turning to the recently signed peace deals between Israel and the United Arab Emirates and Bahrain, Trump said many other Middle Eastern countries would also sign soon. He added, “These groundbreaking peace deals are the dawn of the new Middle East. By taking a different approach, we have achieved different outcomes. Far superior outcomes. We took an approach and the approach worked. We intend to deliver more peace agreements shortly, and I have never been more optimistic for the future of the region. There is no blood in the sand. Those days are hopefully over.”

Trump said the United States was fulfilling its destiny as peacemaker through its strength. He said his country’s weapons are more advanced than ever and prayed that it would never have to use them.
